results.title: [Influence of metformin and N-acetylcysteine on hormonal and genotoxic effects of estrogens and glucose in convalescent cancer patients].
results.text_hl: Our study involved 25 postmenopausal @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (@DISEASE_Endometrial_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D016889 @@@endometrial carcinoma@@@--16, @<m>DISEASE_Breast_Cancer_3</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565336 @@@breast (6) and colorectal (3) cancer@@@, aged 56.8 +/- 0.9).
